Project.Brief history of your project and organi: DataDrill is a forward-thinking data engineering team dedicated to building scalable, high-efficiency solutions for managing and preserving large datasets. Originating with a focus on enterprise analytics and system integration, the team has evolved to embrace decentralized storage technologies. Now, with a growing interest in the Filecoin ecosystem, DataDrill is leveraging its technical expertise to securely onboard and maintain valuable datasets on the networkâ€”supporting long-term accessibility and resilience in the era of distributed data.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The Global Fishing Watch dataset provides open-access, high-resolution data on global fishing activity, derived from satellite tracking and vessel monitoring systems. It offers insights into fishing effort, vessel behavior, and ocean use patterns, helping researchers, policymakers, and conservationists promote sustainable fisheries and marine transparency. Storing this dataset on Filecoin enhances its permanence and resilience, ensuring that vital information on ocean activity remains accessible for environmental monitoring, regulatory enforcement, and scientific research worldwide.
